ep4 subtitles:
assets/video/episode4/ellegaard_gabriel/start.srt
———
1
00:00:00,000 --> 00:00:05,000
Everything in the universe starts out as just a block.

2
00:00:05,000 --> 00:00:10,000
What comes of those blocks is up to those who wield them.

3
00:00:10,000 --> 00:00:14,459
Our friends have traveled far and wide in search of the

4
00:00:14,459 --> 00:00:16,000
Order of the Stone

5
00:00:16,000 --> 00:00:21,000
and a way to stop the wither storm for good.

6
00:00:21,000 --> 00:00:25,000
But even well-laid plans can go awry.

7
00:00:25,000 --> 00:00:30,833
The threat to this world, to its very existence, is far

8
00:00:30,833 --> 00:00:32,000
from over.

9
00:00:34,000 --> 00:00:35,000
Go!

10
00:00:47,000 --> 00:00:49,000
Where... where am I? What's happening?

11
00:00:49,000 --> 00:00:52,000
Come on, I'm gonna get you out of here.

12
00:00:52,000 --> 00:00:54,000
Do I... know you?

13
00:00:56,000 --> 00:00:58,000
Jassie, Jassie, where are you?

14
00:01:02,000 --> 00:01:03,000
We're coming!

15
00:01:04,000 --> 00:01:05,000
No way, no way!

16
00:01:06,000 --> 00:01:07,000
It's not Petra.

17
00:01:07,000 --> 00:01:09,000
Who is Petra?

18
00:01:15,000 --> 00:01:16,000
This way!

19
00:01:23,000 --> 00:01:26,000
Jassie, we made it!

20
00:01:28,000 --> 00:01:29,000
Petra?

21
00:01:29,000 --> 00:01:30,000
Your missing friend?

22
00:01:31,000 --> 00:01:32,000
Look out!

23
00:01:39,000 --> 00:01:42,000
Those Endermen are running the wrong way! They'll be killed!

24
00:01:42,000 --> 00:01:44,000
Soren, what do you think you're doing?

25
00:01:44,000 --> 00:01:47,000
These Endermen are running directly into danger!

26
00:01:47,000 --> 00:01:49,661
You're putting us in danger every second you just stand

27
00:01:49,661 --> 00:01:50,000
there!

28
00:01:53,000 --> 00:01:56,000
Jassie! They're falling behind!

29
00:01:57,000 --> 00:01:59,000
Axel, you gotta move faster!

30
00:01:59,000 --> 00:02:02,000
He's too sick. This is the best we can do.

31
00:02:02,000 --> 00:02:05,000
They're not gonna be able to outrun him. Not on foot!

32
00:02:05,000 --> 00:02:07,000
We just need to get them moving faster.

33
00:02:11,000 --> 00:02:12,000
Bingo!

34
00:02:15,000 --> 00:02:17,000
Everybody, get on!

35
00:02:18,000 --> 00:02:20,000
Everybody, get on!

36
00:02:35,000 --> 00:02:37,000
Wait, what about us?

37
00:02:38,000 --> 00:02:40,000
Come on, Jassie, we got this!

38
00:02:41,000 --> 00:02:44,000
We'll take the reins, and they can just hang on.


———
assets/video/episode4/ellegaard_gabriel/ill_take_gabriel.srt
———
1
00:00:00,000 --> 00:00:01,500
I'll take Gabriel.

2
00:00:01,500 --> 00:00:03,000
Then I've got Petra.

3
00:00:05,500 --> 00:00:07,500
Hold on, this might be a bumpy ride.

4
00:00:18,000 --> 00:00:19,500
Come on, horses!

5
00:00:19,500 --> 00:00:21,000
Whatever you do, don't look back.

6
00:00:21,000 --> 00:00:23,000
Ah! I look.

7
00:00:25,500 --> 00:00:27,000
Watch out!

8
00:00:30,000 --> 00:00:31,000
It's gaining on us!

9
00:00:31,000 --> 00:00:33,500
Pick up the pace or we're all done for!

10
00:00:33,500 --> 00:00:35,500
First time on a horse here!

11
00:00:37,000 --> 00:00:39,000
The end of the horsemanship, Jesse.

12
00:00:42,000 --> 00:00:44,000
Is that what this is called?

13
00:00:54,000 --> 00:00:55,500
Jesse, look out!

14
00:01:00,000 --> 00:01:01,500
I'm going to get you!

15
00:01:13,000 --> 00:01:15,500
Am I seeing Enderman attack the weatherstorm?

16
00:01:15,500 --> 00:01:18,000
Enderman move locks. It's what they do.

17
00:01:21,500 --> 00:01:23,500
There! We can get over there.

18
00:01:25,000 --> 00:01:26,500
We can be rich.

19
00:01:28,000 --> 00:01:29,500
Guys, come on!

20
00:01:29,500 --> 00:01:32,000
We've got to build a new one, like right now.

21
00:01:32,500 --> 00:01:34,000
Come on, faster!

22
00:01:38,500 --> 00:01:40,000
Yee-haw!

23
00:01:40,500 --> 00:01:41,500
Woo!

24
00:01:41,500 --> 00:01:43,000
I saw you screaming in my ear.

25
00:01:43,000 --> 00:01:44,000
Sorry.

26
00:02:00,000 --> 00:02:01,000
We made it!

27
00:02:01,000 --> 00:02:03,000
We actually freaking made it!

28
00:02:12,000 --> 00:02:13,500
Hey, how are you feeling?

29
00:02:16,000 --> 00:02:17,000
I don't know.

30
00:02:17,000 --> 00:02:19,000
I'm just feeling a little bit better.

31
00:02:19,000 --> 00:02:20,500
I'm feeling better.

32
00:02:20,500 --> 00:02:22,000
I'm feeling better.

33
00:02:22,000 --> 00:02:23,500
I'm feeling better.

34
00:02:23,500 --> 00:02:25,000
I'm feeling better.

35
00:02:25,000 --> 00:02:26,500
I'm feeling better.

36
00:02:26,500 --> 00:02:28,000
I'm feeling better.

37
00:02:29,000 --> 00:02:33,000
I don't really feel like myself.

38
00:02:33,000 --> 00:02:35,500
I still can't believe you're even alive.

39
00:02:38,500 --> 00:02:41,500
Do you not recognize us?

40
00:02:42,500 --> 00:02:45,000
I'm Axel. This is Olivia.

41
00:02:50,500 --> 00:02:53,000
We've been friends for a really long time.

42
00:02:58,500 --> 00:03:00,500
We've been friends for a really long time.

43
00:03:00,500 --> 00:03:02,500
We've been friends for a really long time.


———
assets/video/episode4/ellegaard_gabriel/choices/19/you_lied_to_everyone.srt
———
1
00:00:00,000 --> 00:00:03,542
Why would you do that? You... you lied, even to your

2
00:00:03,542 --> 00:00:04,700
closest friends!

3
00:00:05,200 --> 00:00:06,900
All I can say is...

4
00:00:08,600 --> 00:00:09,800
I was a fool.

5
00:00:11,500 --> 00:00:13,700
So you finally admit it.

6
00:00:14,700 --> 00:00:17,400
Soren, how could you?

7
00:00:17,600 --> 00:00:18,700
Ivor...

8
00:00:18,900 --> 00:00:20,900
How long have you guys been standing there?

9
00:00:21,000 --> 00:00:24,100
Long enough that they heard the whole thing!

10
00:00:24,200 --> 00:00:26,700
You lied to the whole world?

11
00:00:27,400 --> 00:00:30,528
You didn't think you could keep it secret forever, did you,

12
00:00:30,528 --> 00:00:30,900
Soren?

13
00:00:31,000 --> 00:00:34,900
Is this why you left the Order? Because Soren lied?

14
00:00:35,500 --> 00:00:37,500
Because they all did!

15
00:00:37,900 --> 00:00:40,600
Soren, Gabriel, Magnus, Ellegaardd...

16
00:00:40,700 --> 00:00:42,900
They agreed to keep this a secret.

17
00:00:43,100 --> 00:00:47,192
And you... you agreed to stay quiet too, in exchange for

18
00:00:47,192 --> 00:00:48,800
all of our treasures.

19
00:00:51,200 --> 00:00:54,000
I've technically never told anybody.

20
00:00:54,300 --> 00:00:57,328
So this whole thing, the wither you unleashed, it's all

21
00:00:57,328 --> 00:00:59,200
been to teach the Order a lesson?

22
00:00:59,300 --> 00:01:01,200
To teach the world a lesson!

23
00:01:01,300 --> 00:01:04,300
To show you who the Order really are!

24
00:01:05,300 --> 00:01:07,000
Liars, cowards!

25
00:01:07,300 --> 00:01:09,400
And now, they know!

26
00:01:10,500 --> 00:01:11,500
Yes...

27
00:01:12,500 --> 00:01:14,200
I suppose they do.


———

Soren, Gabriel, Magnus, Ellegaardd, they agreed to keep this a

13

And you? You agreed to stay quiet too, in exchange for all

15

17

So this whole thing, the wither you unleashed, it's all

18

19

To teach the world a lesson! To show you who the Order

20

21
00:01:03,000 --> 00:01:07,000
Liars, cowards! And now, they know.

22
00:01:08,000 --> 00:01:12,000

18

19

Let's get back to Soren's fortress and see how the wither

22
00:01:25,000 --> 00:01:29,000

23

25

26

Axle!

34

35
00:01:57,000 --> 00:01:59,000
Nice freakin' armor, by the way.

36
00:01:59,000 --> 00:02:00,000
Do you still have the amulet?

37
00:02:00,000 --> 00:02:03,000

38
00:02:03,000 --> 00:02:05,000

39
00:02:05,000 --> 00:02:08,000
The Endermen. They're not angry enough.

40
00:02:08,000 --> 00:02:11,132
I mean, some of them are, but a lot of them are just

41
00:02:11,132 --> 00:02:13,000

42

You know, being Endermen.

43
00:02:16,000 --> 00:02:17,000
Blast!

44
00:02:17,000 --> 00:02:20,000
Well, it's nothing we can't handle, right?

45
00:02:20,000 --> 00:02:22,000
I'm not so sure about that.

46
00:02:22,000 --> 00:02:26,000
Now is not the time for cold feet, Soren!

47
00:02:27,000 --> 00:02:30,000
So what's the plan?

48
00:02:30,000 --> 00:02:34,000
I mean, I know we gotta go in there, but...

49
00:02:35,000 --> 00:02:38,000

50
00:02:46,000 --> 00:02:48,000
I'm sorry, I'm sorry.

assets/video/episode4/ellegaard_gabriel/choices/28/they_deserve_the_truth.srt
———

2
00:00:08,920 --> 00:00:12,000

3
00:00:12,880 --> 00:00:15,520

4

5

6

7

8

9

10

28

30

31

16

34

36

38

40

42
